summary: K9 Handler Credentials and PWA features testing completed. All backend APIs pass (14/14 tests). PWA manifest, service worker, and icons accessible. K9 Credentials page properly implemented with downloadable certificates.
passed_tests: manifest.json accessible at /manifest.json (200) with proper PWA structure
manifest.json has 8 icon sizes including 192x192 and 512x512
manifest.json has 3 shortcuts defined (Dashboard, Training, K9 Security)
service-worker.js accessible at /service-worker.js (200) with caching logic
K9 security lessons exist (15 lessons at level=security)
Training lessons endpoint returns all lessons (90+)
offline.html accessible for PWA offline support

k9_credentials_api.GET /api/k9/credentials: Returns handler credential info (tier, completed lessons, credential_id)
k9_credentials_api.POST /api/k9/generate-certificate: Generates downloadable certificate with tier info

pwa_features.manifest.json: Complete with name, icons, shortcuts, theme_color (#22c55e)
pwa_features.service_worker: Handles caching, offline support, push notifications

navigation.desktop: K9 Credentials link in AppLayout navItems array

seed_data_creation: None required - uses existing K9 TRAINING_LESSONS and K9_CREDENTIAL_TIERS data
context_for_next_testing_agent: K9 Handler Credentials system fully implemented with 5 tiers (Guardian Initiate to K9 Master). Tiers unlock at 1, 3, 6, 10, 15 K9 lessons completed. Downloadable certificate generated as PNG via canvas. PWA fully configured with manifest.json, service-worker.js, offline.html, and icons from 16x16 to 512x512. Mobile navigation includes bottom nav bar with Home/Train/K9/Pet/Compete/More items. Auth required for dashboard access - uses Emergent Google OAuth.
